name: Ultimate God Angel: Gigaforce EX
description:
Pilot your Gigaforce EX ship into another world using virtual cockpit controls. Protect your Ultimate God Angel by taking out giant space bugs before they evolve into bigger bugs. Fight against time as your ship succumbs to radiation.

This game was built over a week for VR Jam 2020!

Taylor Shechet - 3D Art, Animation, Visual Design

https://twitter.com/_tlr_

Jeremy Kaufmann - Music, Audio/SFX, Writing, VFX

https://twitter.com/whydoisay

Jason Gluck - Rigging/Procedural Animation, Gameplay Programming, UI/UX

https://twitter.com/jasonofthestorm
